words.meaning: Subject noun with definite article (ال) showing assimilation
Predicate adjective in nominative case, feminine singular

explanations.overall_structure: Simple nominal sentence (جملة اسمية) with subject-predicate structure in Arabic
explanations.key_features: Definite article assimilation with sun letter, adjective agreement in gender and case

words.meaning: Subject noun in nominative case with definite article
Relative pronoun connecting to the following relative clause
Imperfect verb in present tense, third person masculine singular
Adverb of manner indicating intensity
Perfect verb with future particle (س) indicating future tense
Preposition indicating acquisition or attainment
Object noun in genitive case after preposition
Attributive adjective describing the noun درجة

explanations.overall_structure: Complex sentence with main clause and relative clause (صلة), verb-subject-object word order
explanations.key_features: Case marking (i'rab), relative clause structure, verb conjugation patterns

words.meaning: Subject noun in nominative case, derived from Greek with Arabic definite article
Feminine relative pronoun introducing relative clause
Passive voice particle with following verb
Passive verb form IV (أفعل) in perfect tense, feminine singular
Preposition ل + definite noun in genitive case
Time adverb indicating present moment
Imperfect verb form VIII (افتعل) in active voice
Direct object in accusative case, plural
Adverb of manner from root ك-ف-و (efficiency)
Comparative adjective in elative form
Comparative preposition
Object of comparison in genitive case
Attributive adjective indicating precedence

explanations.overall_structure: Complex passive construction with relative clause, comparative structure, and technical vocabulary
explanations.key_features: Form VIII verb patterns, elative comparative adjectives, passive voice with relative clauses, technical Arabic vocabulary

words.meaning: Greeting noun used as interjection
Preposition indicating means or accompaniment
Interrogative particle asking about manner
Possessive construction (حال + ك) meaning 'your condition'

explanations.key_features: Possessive pronoun attachment, interrogative word order
